Description: An online banking site from Parasoft with login and REST/SOAP APIs. You can also access the database if you run the project locally using the source code.

TestCases.Name: Login to Web UI
TestCases.Description: Test case for testing whether a user is able to login into the web application.
Steps: Open the URL in your browser and navigate through the website until you reach the login page.

TestCases.Name: Login with Valid Credentials
TestCases.Description: Verify that a user can log in with valid credentials.
Steps: Verify that the user is redirected to the account overview page.

TestCases.Name: Login with Invalid Credentials
TestCases.Description: Verify that login fails with incorrect credentials.
Steps: Verify that an error message is displayed and login is not successful.

TestCases.Name: Login with Empty Fields
TestCases.Description: Verify that login fails when required fields are left empty.
Steps: Leave the username/email and password fields empty.
Verify that an error message is displayed indicating required fields.
